name: Investor Square Investment Blog
overview:
A blog which is solely dedicated to keeping investors up to date with the latest news and reviews on alternative investment vehicles, in property, green energy, land and resources.

All of our content is unique and original, we have linked our blog up with twitter and openly invite guestposts.

We cover all global markets and do our best to source the very best and most informative content.

All of our investments are legitimate and SIPP (self invested personal pension) approved. We also cover commercial investments such as office buildings, retail, leisure centres and hotel resorts.

external_links.title: Property, Green Energy and Land Investments
